question: You have seen an advertisement in an Australian magazine for someone to live with a family for six months and look after their six-year-old child.Write a letter to the parents. In your letter•	explain why you would like the job•	give details of why you would be a suitable person to employ•	say how you would spend your free time while you are in Australia
text: I am Ruchika Munjewar from Australia residing at Capetown bridge,I am writing this letter to inform you that I saw your advertisement in Australian magazine regarding a babysitting post. Since I am planning to move to your location and also looking for a babysitting job which will be more convenient for me to do the work along with my studies.

Since I am so happy-go-lucky type of person  I used to share a special bond with the children and also I have a little experience in handling and taking care of the kids. So that's why I believe that  I am a suitable candidate for this position.

And also meanwhile in my leisure time, I would like to room in the country, I am a person who is really touched with  nature so I'lllspend my time in the National Parks, watching the kangaroos, tickling the cats and also clicking the picture of nature.
Looking forward to your positive response to my application .
